fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.comparators

Class DistanceFeatureComparator<T extends IFeature>

  • Object
    • DistanceFeatureComparator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparator<T>

    public class DistanceFeatureComparator<T extends IFeature>
extends Object
implements Comparator<T>
    A comparator to sort features lists using the distance to a given geometry: the nearest to the geometry is the smallest for the comparator.
    Author:
    GTouya
